input.sentences: last night i had some good chinese food .
then i went to hard rock for some drinks .
after that i explored the city and saw this beautiful boat .
next i took a ride on the ferris wheel .
output.sentences: It was getting close to night and we all wanted some Chinese food.
After our meal we went to the Hard Rock Cafe and enjoyed some giant drinks.
None of us were sleepy and so we went out to explore the city by boat.
There was a giant ferris wheel and we went on it.
We all turned on our way home to get a look once more at the gorgeous city skyline.
